text:
Osedea (http://osedea.com/) - Montreal, Canada - ONSITE

At Osedea we are a small, but very resourceful team. We develop best in class web & mobile solutions leveraging new technologies, languages and frameworks to solve complex challenges. At Osedea, you will have the chance to work on a wide variety of projects with a lot of diversity and responsibility, in a fast-paced learning environment. Because we are a small but fast growing team, there is tons of opportunities to make important decisions and impact the future of the company.

You should be comfortable with:

* PHP 5 (with Laravel or Zend)

* Javascript (ideally knowledge of AngularJS)

* Relational databases (MySQL, Postgres)

* REST APIs

* Unit Testing

Submit your application at join@osedea.com.
